"npm.cmd" : "npm", ['install'], { stdio: 'inherit', cwd: srcPath}); hexo-adminÂú®Á∫øÈÉ®ÁΩ≤ÂäüËÉΩÂêÑÁßçÊä•Èîô 123[ÁåúÊÉ≥]1.deploy.jsÂ∫ì‰∏≠ÂëΩ‰ª§ÈÄÇÁî®‰∫éLinux,‰∏çÈÄÇÁî®‰∫éWindows2.spawn‰∏éexecÂå∫Âà´ BspawnÂíåexecÂèÇÊï∞Âå∫Âà´ [2]child_process.spawn(command,[args],[options])command String Â∞ÜË¶ÅËøêË°åÁöÑÂëΩ‰ª§„ÄÇargs Array Â≠óÁ¨¶‰∏≤ÂèÇÊï∞Êï∞ÁªÑ„ÄÇoptions ÈÖçÁΩÆÂØπË±°Ôºö cwd String Â≠êËøõÁ®ãÁöÑÂΩìÂâçÂ∑•‰ΩúÁõÆÂΩï env Object ÁéØÂ¢ÉÂèòÈáèÈîÆÂÄºÂØπ stdio Array|String Â≠êËøõÁ®ãÁöÑstdioÈÖçÁΩÆ detached Boolean Ëøô‰∏™Â≠êËøõÁ®ãÂ∞Ü‰ºöÂèòÊàêËøõÁ®ãÁªÑÁöÑÈ¢ÜÂØº uid Number ËÆæÁΩÆÁî®Êà∑ËøõÁ®ãÁöÑID gid Number ËÆæÁΩÆËøõÁ®ãÁªÑÁöÑIDËøîÂõûÂÄº: ChildProcessÂØπË±° Âà©Áî®ÁªôÂÆöÁöÑÂëΩ‰ª§‰ª•ÂèäÂèÇÊï∞ÊâßË°å‰∏Ä‰∏™Êñ∞ÁöÑËøõÁ®ãÔºåÂ¶ÇÊûúÊ≤°ÊúâÂèÇÊï∞Êï∞ÁªÑÔºåÈÇ£‰πàargsÂ∞ÜÈªòËÆ§ÊòØ‰∏Ä‰∏™Á©∫Êï∞ÁªÑ„ÄÇ child_process.exec(command,[options],callback)command String Â∞ÜË¶ÅËøêË°åÁöÑÂëΩ‰ª§,ÂèÇÊï∞‰ΩøÁî®Á©∫Ê†ºÈöîÂºÄoptions ÈÖçÁΩÆÂØπË±°Ôºö cwd String Â≠êËøõÁ®ãÁöÑÂΩìÂâçÂ∑•‰ΩúÁõÆÂΩï„ÄÇ env Object ÁéØÂ¢ÉÂèòÈáèÈîÆÂÄºÂØπ encoding String Â≠óÁ¨¶ÁºñÁ†ÅÔºàÈªòËÆ§Ôºö‚Äôutf8‚ÄôÔºâ shell String Â∞ÜË¶ÅÊâßË°åÂëΩ‰ª§ÁöÑShellÔºàÈªòËÆ§: Âú®UNIX‰∏≠‰∏∫/bin/shÔºå Âú®Windows‰∏≠‰∏∫cmd.exeÔºå ShellÂ∫îÂΩìËÉΩËØÜÂà´ -c ÂºÄÂÖ≥Âú®UNIX‰∏≠ÔºåÊàñ /s /c Âú®Windows‰∏≠„ÄÇ Âú®Windows‰∏≠ÔºåÂëΩ‰ª§Ë°åËß£ÊûêÂ∫îÂΩìËÉΩÂÖºÂÆπcmd.exeÔºâ„ÄÇ timeout Number Ë∂ÖÊó∂Êó∂Èó¥ÔºàÈªòËÆ§Ôºö 0Ôºâ maxBuffer Number Âú®stdoutÊàñstderr‰∏≠ÂÖÅËÆ∏Â≠òÂú®ÁöÑÊúÄÂ§ßÁºìÂÜ≤Ôºà‰∫åËøõÂà∂ÔºâÔºåÂ¶ÇÊûúË∂ÖÂá∫ÈÇ£‰πàÂ≠êËøõÁ®ãÂ∞Ü‰ºöË¢´ÊùÄÊ≠ª ÔºàÈªòËÆ§: 200*1024Ôºâ killSignal String ÁªìÊùü‰ø°Âè∑ÔºàÈªòËÆ§Ôºö‚ÄôSIGTERM‚ÄôÔºâ detached Boolean Ëøô‰∏™Â≠êËøõÁ®ãÂ∞Ü‰ºöÂèòÊàêËøõÁ®ãÁªÑÁöÑÈ¢ÜÂØº uid Number ËÆæÁΩÆÁî®Êà∑ËøõÁ®ãÁöÑID gid Number ËÆæÁΩÆËøõÁ®ãÁªÑÁöÑID spawnÂíåexecË∞ÉÁî®ÂØπË±°Âå∫Âà´ [2]spawnÊé•ÂèóÁöÑÁ¨¨‰∏Ä‰∏™ÂèÇÊï∞‰∏∫Êñá‰ª∂ÔºåËÄåexecÊé•ÂèóÁöÑÁ¨¨‰∏Ä‰∏™ÂèÇÊï∞ÊòØÂëΩ‰ª§„ÄÇ 12// NodeÊ∫êÁ†Å‰∏≠ÂÖ≥‰∫éspawnÁöÑÈÉ®ÂàÜvar spawn = exports.spawn = function(file, args, options) 123456789101112// execÈÉ®ÂàÜ if (process.platform === 'win32') { file = 'cmd.exe'; args = ['/s', '/c', '"' + command + '"']; // Make a shallow copy before patching so we don't clobber the user's // options object. options = util._extend({}, options); options.windowsVerbatimArguments = true;} else { file = '/bin/sh'; args = ['-c', command];} ÊâÄ‰ª•Âú®Windows‰∏ãÁõ¥Êé•ËøêË°å require(‚Äòchild_process‚Äô).spawn(‚Äòdir‚Äô) ‰ºöÊä•ÂºÇÂ∏∏ËØ¥Ê≤°ÊúâÊ≠§Êñá‰ª∂ÔºåËÄå‰ΩøÁî®execÂàô‰∏ç‰ºö„ÄÇËã•Ë¶Å‰ΩøÁî®spwanÔºåÂ∫îÂÜôÊàêrequire(‚Äòchild_process‚Äô).spawn(‚Äòcmd.exe‚Äô,[‚Äò\s‚Äô, ‚Äò\c‚Äô, ‚Äòdir‚Äô])„ÄÇ spawnÂíåexecËøîÂõûÂÄºÂå∫Âà´ [2,3,4]child_process.spawn ËøîÂõû‰∏Ä‰∏™ÊúâËæìÂá∫ÊµÅÂíåÈîôËØØÊµÅÁöÑÂØπË±°ÔºåÂèØ‰ª•ÁõëÂê¨ÂÆÉ‰ª¨‰ªéËÄåËé∑ÂèñÊï∞ÊçÆÔºåËæìÂá∫ÊµÅÊúâÊï∞ÊçÆÂíåÁªìÊùü‰∫ã‰ª∂„ÄÇchild_process.spawn ÈÄÇÂêàÁî®Âú®Â§ÑÁêÜÂ§ßÈáèÊï∞ÊçÆËøîÂõûÁöÑÂú∫ÊôØ‰∏≠ÔºåÂõæÁâáÂ§ÑÁêÜÔºåËØª‰∫åËøõÂà∂Êï∞ÊçÆ(Êñá‰ª∂ËØªÂèñ)Á≠âÁ≠â„ÄÇchild_process.spawn ÊòØ‰∏Ä‰∏™ÂºÇÊ≠•ÂáΩÊï∞ÔºåÂú®ÊâßË°åÊó∂Â∞±‰ºöËøîÂõûÊï∞ÊçÆÔºåËÄå‰∏çÊòØÁ≠âÂà∞Êï∞ÊçÆÈÉΩÂ§ÑÁêÜÂ•Ω‰∫ÜÂÜç‰∏ÄÊ¨°ËøîÂõû„ÄÇ child_process.exec ‰∏ÄÊ¨°ÊÄßËøîÂõûËæìÂá∫ÊâßË°åÁªìÊûúÂÜÖÂÆπÔºåÈªòËÆ§ÁöÑbufferÂ§ßÂ∞è‰∏∫200kbÔºåÂ¶ÇÊûúexecËøîÂõûÁöÑÂÜÖÂÆπË∂ÖËøá 200kbÂàô‰ºöËøîÂõû‰∏Ä‰∏™ÈîôËØØ(Error maxBuffer execeded)ÔºåÂèØ‰ª•ÈÄöËøáËÆæÁΩÆoptions bufferÁöÑsizeÊù•Êâ©Â§ß bufferÁöÑÂ§ßÂ∞è„ÄÇchild_process.exec ÊòØ‰∏Ä‰∏™ÂêåÊ≠•ÁöÑÂºÇÊ≠•ÊñπÊ≥ïÔºåËôΩÁÑ∂ÊñπÊ≥ï‰ΩìÊú¨Ë∫´ÊòØÂºÇÊ≠•ÁöÑÔºå‰ΩÜÊòØÂÆÉË¶ÅÁ≠â child process ÊâßË°åÂÆåÊàêÂêéÔºåÂÜçÊääËøîÂõûÊï∞ÊçÆÂÖ®ËøîÂõûÁªôÂõûË∞ÉÊñπÊ≥ï„ÄÇexecÊñπÊ≥ïÁõ∏ÊØîspawnÊñπÊ≥ïÂ§öÊèê‰æõ‰∫Ü‰∏Ä‰∏™ÂõûË∞ÉÂáΩÊï∞ÔºåÂèØ‰ª•Ëé∑ÂèñÂ≠êËøõÁ®ãËæìÂá∫„ÄÇËøô‰∏é‰∏∫ËøîÂõûÁöÑChildProcessÂØπË±°ÁöÑstdoutÊàñstderrÁõëÂê¨data‰∫ã‰ª∂Êù•Ëé∑ÂæóËæìÂá∫ÁöÑÂå∫Âà´Âú®‰∫éÔºödata‰∫ã‰ª∂ÁöÑÊñπÂºè‰ºöÂú®Â≠êËøõÁ®ãÊúâÊï∞ÊçÆÊó∂Â∞±Ëß¶ÂèëÔºåÂπ∂ÊääÊï∞ÊçÆËøîÂõûÁªôNode„ÄÇËÄåÂõûË∞ÉÂáΩÊï∞ÔºåÂàô‰ºöÂÖàÂ∞ÜÊï∞ÊçÆÁºìÂ≠òÂú®ÂÜÖÂ≠ò‰∏≠ÔºàÊï∞ÊçÆÈáèÂ∞è‰∫émaxBufferÂèÇÊï∞ÔºâÔºåÁ≠âÂæÖÂ≠êËøõÁ®ãËøêË°åÂÆåÊØïÂêéÂÜçË∞ÉÁî®ÂõûË∞ÉÂáΩÊï∞ÔºåÂπ∂ÊääÊúÄÁªàÊï∞ÊçÆ‰∫§ÁªôÂõûË∞ÉÂáΩÊï∞„ÄÇ spawnÂú®windowsËøêË°åÈóÆÈ¢ò [5]Node.jsÁöÑÂ≠êËøõÁ®ãchild_process‰∏ãÁöÑspawnÂáΩÊï∞ÂèØ‰ª•Áî®‰∫éË∞ÉÁî®Á≥ªÁªü‰∏äÁöÑÂëΩ‰ª§ÔºåÂú® Linux, macOS Á≠âÁ≥ªÁªü‰∏äÂèØ‰ª•ÊâßË°å 123456// Ë∞ÉÁî® npm ÂëΩ‰ª§const spawn = require('child_process').spawn;spawn('npm', { stdio: 'inherit'}); 12345678910// ÂêåÊ†∑ÁöÑËØ≠Âè•Âú® Windows ‰∏äÊâßË°å‰ºöÊä•ÈîôError: spawn npm ENOENT at exports._errnoException (util.js:855:11) at Process.ChildProcess._handle.onexit (internal/child_process.js:178:32) at onErrorNT (internal/child_process.js:344:16) at nextTickCallbackWith2Args (node.js:455:9) at process._tickCallback (node.js:369:17) at Function.Module.runMain (module.js:432:11) at startup (node.js:141:18) at node.js:980:3 Âõ†‰∏∫Âú® Windows ‰∏äÊâßË°å npm Êó∂ÔºåÂÆûÈôÖÊâßË°åÁöÑÊòØnpm.cmdÊâπÂ§ÑÁêÜÔºåËÄåÂú® Windows ‰∏äÔºå.cmd,.batÊâπÂ§ÑÁêÜÊó†Ê≥ïËÑ±Á¶ªcmd.exeËß£ÈáäÂô®ËÄåÂçïÁã¨ËøêË°åÁöÑ„ÄÇÂõ†Ê≠§ÔºåÈúÄË¶ÅÊòæÂºèÂú∞Ë∞ÉÁî®cmd„ÄÇ 123456789spawn('cmd', ['/c', 'npm'], { stdio: 'inherit'});// ÊàñËÄÖÂú®Ë∞ÉÁî®spawnÊó∂ÔºåËÆæÁΩÆshellÈÄâÈ°π‰∏∫true‰ª•ÈöêÂºèÂú∞Ë∞ÉÁî®cmdÔºàNode.js v6+Ôºâspawn('npm', { stdio: 'inherit', shell: true}); ËôΩÁÑ∂Âú®Linux, macOSÁ≠âÁ≥ªÁªü‰∏ä‰∏çÈúÄË¶ÅËÆæÁΩÆshellÈÄâÈ°πÔºåÂëΩ‰ª§‰πüËÉΩÊ≠£Â∏∏ÊâßË°åÔºõËÆæÁΩÆshell‰∏∫true‰πü‰∏ç‰ºöÂ¶®Á¢çÂëΩ‰ª§ÁöÑÊâßË°åÔºåÂè™ÊòØ‰ºöÈ¢ùÂ§ñÁöÑ‰∫ßÁîü‰∏Ä‰∏™‰∏çÂøÖË¶ÅÁöÑshellËøõÁ®ãÂΩ±ÂìçÊÄßËÉΩ„ÄÇ Âõ†Ê≠§ÔºåÁºñÂÜôË∑®Âπ≥Âè∞ÁöÑspawnÂëΩ‰ª§Âèà‰∏çÊÉ≥Â¢ûÂä†È¢ùÂ§ñÁöÑÂºÄÈîÄÔºåÂèØ‰ª•: 12345678const process = require('process');const { spawn } = require('child_process');spawn('npm', { stdio: 'inherit', // ‰ªÖÂú®ÂΩìÂâçËøêË°åÁéØÂ¢É‰∏∫ Windows Êó∂ÔºåÊâç‰ΩøÁî® shell shell: process.platform === 'win32'}); node.jsÊâßË°åshellÂëΩ‰ª§ [6]12345678910// ÂºïÂÖ•Â≠êËøõÁ®ãÊ®°Âùóvar process = require('child_process');// Ë∞ÉÁî®ËØ•Ê®°ÂùóexecÊñπÊ≥ïprocess.exec('shutdown -h now',function (error, stdout, stderr) { // ÂõûË∞ÉÂáΩÊï∞ÈùûÂøÖÈ°ª if (error !== null) { console.log('exec error: ' + error); }}); [Â∑≤ÂÆûÁé∞,Êú™Ëß£ÂÜ≥] Ë∑üË∏™webËØ∑Ê±Ç,‰øÆÊîπ/hexo-admin/deploy.jsÂ∫ìÊ∫êÁ†Åv 0.1 ‰ΩøÁî®exec123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930// ÊâßË°å: Âú®ÂºÄÂêØhexoÊúçÂä°ÁöÑgit-bash‰∏≠ÊâßË°å// ÊïàÊûú: ÊâßË°åÈÄüÂ∫¶ÊÖ¢,ËÉΩÂú®ÂΩìÂâçÈ°µÈù¢‰∏ãÊñπËé∑Âæógit-bashÈÉ®ÁΩ≤‰ø°ÊÅØ// Ë≠¶Âëä: DeprecationWarning: fs.SyncWriteStream is deprecated. //var spawn = require('child_process').spawnvar process = require('child_process')function once(fn) { var called = false return function () { if (!called) fn.apply(this, arguments) called = true }}module.exports = function (command, message, done) { done = once(done); //var proc = spawn(command, [message], {detached: true, stdio: 'inherit', shell: true}); var proc = process.exec('sh '+command, [message]); var stdout = '' var stderr = ''; proc.stdout.on('data', function(data){stdout += data.toString()}) proc.stderr.on('data', function(data){stderr += data.toString()}) proc.on('error', function(err) { done(err, {stdout: stdout, stderr: stderr}); }); proc.on('close', function () { done(null, {stdout: stdout, stderr: stderr}); });} v 0.2 ‰ΩøÁî®spawn12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334// ÊâßË°å: Êñ∞ÂºÄcmd,hexoÊâßË°å// ÊïàÊûú: ÈÄüÂ∫¶Âø´(‰∏ªÂÆ¢ËßÇ),‰∏çÂú®ÂΩìÂâçÈ°µÈù¢‰∏ãÊñπËé∑ÂæóÈÉ®ÁΩ≤‰ø°ÊÅØ// Ë≠¶Âëä: DeprecationWarning: fs.SyncWriteStream is deprecated. var spawn = require('child_process').spawn//var process = require('child_process')function once(fn) { var called = false return function () { if (!called) fn.apply(this, arguments) called = true }}module.exports = function (command, message, done) { done = once(done); var proc = spawn('sh '+command, [message], {detached: true, stdio: 'inherit', shell: true}); //var proc = process.exec('sh '+command, [message]); var stdout = ''; var stderr = ''; // Á©∫ÊåáÈíàÊä•Èîô(Error: Cannot read property 'on' of null),‰ΩÜ‰∏çÂΩ±ÂìçÂäüËÉΩ //proc.stdout.on('data', function(data){stdout += data.toString()}) //proc.stderr.on('data', function(data){stderr += data.toString()}) proc.on('error', function(err) { done(err, {stdout: stdout, stderr: stderr}); }); proc.on('close', function () { done(null, {stdout: stdout, stderr: stderr}); });} [Â∑≤ÊîæÂºÉ]1231.npm install --save hexo-admin deploy.jsÊ∫êÁ†Å‰ªçÊä•Ë≠¶Âëä2.execÂíåspawnÂΩìÂâçÊÉÖÂÜµÈÉΩÂÉèÊòØÂêåÊ≠•ÊñπÊ≥ï T/Q: Node.js‰∏≠spawn‰∏éexec Windows‰∏ãspawnÈóÆÈ¢ò jsÊâßË°åËÑöÊú¨Êñá‰ª∂(e.g. .sh) Ref:[1] nodejsÂú®spawn‰∏≠ÊâßË°ånpmÊä•Èîô [Error: spawn ENOENT]https://www.cnblogs.com/xiziyin/p/3578905.html[2] Node.js‰∏≠spawn‰∏éexecÁöÑÂºÇÂêåÊØîËæÉhttps://segmentfault.com/a/1190000002913884[3]. execÂíåspawnÁöÑÂå∫Âà´https://www.cnblogs.com/xiaoniuzai/p/6889164.html[4]. entry.title: Emoji
entry.content: README.md(Hexo-filter-github-emojis)A Hexo plugin that adds emoji support, using Github Emojis API. Check out the Emoji Cheat Sheet for all the emojis it supports. V2 is not compatible with V1. V1 replaces codepoints with <img> tags. While V2 makes the font transparent and displays emojis with background-image. Installation1$ npm install hexo-filter-github-emojis --save OptionsYou can configure this plugin in _config.yml. Default options: 123456githubEmojis: enable: true className: github-emoji inject: true styles: customEmojis: className - Image class name. For example :sparkles: :sparkles: the filter will generate something like this: 1<span class="github-emoji" style="background-image:url(https://assets-cdn.github.com/images/icons/emoji/unicode/2728.png?v8)" data-src="https://assets-cdn.github.com/images/icons/emoji/unicode/2728.png?v8">&#x2728;</span> inject - If true, the filter will inject proper inline styles and a script to fallback when image loading fails. If you can modify script files and style files, you may turn this off and add them yourself. 1<span class="github-emoji" style="color:transparent;background:no-repeat url(...) center/contain" ...> A script tag will be appended, the className changes according to the options: 12345678910111213141516171819<script> document.querySelectorAll('.github-emojis') .forEach(el => { if (!el.dataset.src) { return; } const img = document.createElement('img'); img.style = 'display:none !important;'; img.src = el.dataset.src; img.addEventListener('error', () => { img.remove(); el.style.color = 'inherit'; el.style.backgroundImage = 'none'; el.style.background = 'none'; }); img.addEventListener('load', () => { img.remove(); }); document.body.appendChild(img); });</script> styles - inline styles. For example: 1234githubEmojis: styles: font-size: 2em font-weight: bold outputs: 1<span class="github-emoji" style="font-size:2em;font-weight:bold;background-image:url(...)" ...> customEmojis - You can specify your own list. An object or JSON string is valid. The filter will first check the customEmojis then fallback to the Github Emojis list. For example: 1234githubEmojis: customEmojis: arrow_left: https://path/to/arrow_left.png arrow_right: https://path/to/arrow_right.png If you need to add code points that are not in the Github list, you can do this: 123456githubEmojis: customEmojis: man_juggling: src: https://path/to/man_juggling.png codepoints: ["1f939", "2642"] arrow_right: https://path/to/arrow_right.png TagIf you do not like the ::-style keywords, you can always use tags: 1{% github_emoji sparkles %} Add no-emoji: true to front-matter to stop replacing ::: 12345678---title: Hello Worldno-emoji: true---:tada: as it is.{% github_emoji tada %} still works. HelperYou can also render a GitHub emoji from a template using the github_emoji helper: 1<h1><% github_emoji('octocat') %></h1> WebsiteüòäüòâüòÇüòçü•∞üòòüòóüòùü§™ü§©ü•∫üò≠üò§ü•µü•∂ü§îüòÆüòàüëπü§°ü§ôhttps://www.emojicopy.com/ Ref[1]Sanarous(75%)[2]Hexo NexT ÂºÄÂêØ emoji
Unexpectedly walking the night out of the feeling of intimacy. (M1565530800)

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
